title: New: Låpsley – Falling Short
content:
In the space of nine months Låpsley has gone from a complete unknown to one of the UK’s most exciting new artists, and this excitement is only set to grow with the announcement of her brand new EP.

‘Falling Short’, as premiered by Annie Mac last night on her BBC Radio 1 show, is a magnificent step up while retaining the stripped back, pitched down vocal essence that galvanised her debut effort ‘Station’. Demonstrating not only Låpsley’s strength as a stellar vocalist but also as a soulful lyricist with a clear vision for her production, ‘Falling Short’ is only the beginning of the next stage in what will no doubt be a long and successful career for this young Liverpudlian.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
